summary: The Woman Who Wasn't There is a psychological thriller that goes inside the mind of history's most infamous 9/11 survivor.
cast: Tania Head|Elia Zedeno|Gerry Bogacz|Brendan Chellis|Lori Mogol|Marian Fontana|Janice Cilento|Richard Zimbler|Marta Forn|Alison Crowther|Linda Gormley|Amanda Ripley|Michael Bloomberg|Francisco Esteve Corbella|Rudy Giuliani|Jeff Glor|Alice Greenwald|Francisco Javier Esteve Head|Sonia Humet|Diane Sawyer|Chris Wragge
director: Director: Angelo J. Guglielmo Jr. (as Angelo Guglielmo)
title: The Woman Who Wasn't There
